mutants.code:
import re

def reverse_string(s):
    s = re.sub('', '', s)
    return s[::-1]

import re

def reverse_string(s):
    s = re.sub('[^A-Za-z0-9]+', 'MUTATED', s)
    return s[::-1]

import re

def reverse_string(s):
    s = re.sub('[^A-Za-z0-9]+', '', s)
    return s[::+1]

import re

def reverse_string(s):
    s = re.sub('[^A-Za-z0-9]+', '', s)
    return s[::-2]

import re

def reverse_string(s):
    s = re.sub('[^A-Za-z0-9]+', '', s)
    return s[::-0]

import re

def reverse_string(s):
    s = re.sub('[^A-Za-z0-9]+', '', s)
    return s[::-0]

import re

def reverse_string(s):
    s = re.sub('[^A-Za-z0-9]+', '', s)
    return s[::--1]
